content: to sign up for this knit along please go to the rowan connect platform at the link above there is also a facebook group for this project - join at https //www facebook com/groups/620741256591207 from there you will receive an intro email and video from martin once the knit along has started you will receive emails with links to the rowan connect platform to obtain the next segments of the pattern the make a long is presented with an introduction seven pattern releases and a cast off party july 26- introduction thursday 17th august - release 1 with tutorial thursday 24th august - release 2 with tutorial thursday 31st august - release 3 thursday 7th september - release 4 with live virtual meet up - 5 00-6 00pm bst thursday 14th september - release 5 thursday 21st september - release 6 thursday 28th september - release 7 with tutorial thursday 12th october - casting off party - a live virtual meet up - 7 00-8 00pm bst there is both a seven colour version and a two colour version each version has two different palettes yarn used rowan felted tweed seven colour option traditional version a 177 clay - 5 balls b 154 ginger - 1 ball c 170 seafarer - 1 ball d 161 avocado - 2 balls e 158 pine - 1 ball f 175 cinnamon - 1 ball g 150 rage - 1 ball bold version a 211 black - 5 balls b 198 zinnia - 1 ball c 215 ciel - 1 ball d 213 lime - 2 balls e 220 sulfur - 1 ball f 216 french mustard - 1 ball g 200 barbara - 1 ball two color option traditional version a 210 aluminum - 5 balls b 186 tawny - 4 balls bold version a 165 scree - 5 balls b 159 carbon - 4 balls ** it is possible to make this into a pillow if so you will need 3 balls of the mc and one ball of all of the cc s if you are making the multicolored option and likely 2 balls of the cc s if you are making the two color options
